creator: Shadow Weather LLC
descriptionHtml:
Shadow Weather is the most accurate weather forecast with daily forecasts; and down to the hour forecasts; you will always be prepared for what the weather has in store. Smart weather conditions and notifications will let you know of severe alerts and when the storm will start so you can be ahead.

Once the storm hits you have powerful interactive radar tools with severe storm cell tracking and a real time lightning strike tracker. Minute by minute rain forecasting keeps you on top of the rain.

Shadow Weather syncs with your phone's calendar so you can know the forecast for upcoming events easily.

Keep track of your health with air quality information.

You can easily see the past and current radar using the fastest most powerful and customizable interactive radar.

Here are some of the features: daily forecast, hourly forecast, minutely forecasts, weather alerts, air quality, interactive radar, storm tracker, and more!



Imagery Powered by AerisWeather.
Data Powered by AerisWeather, Dark Sky.
descriptionShort: Smart Weather Conditions. Live lightning tracker. Severe storm tracker.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Patch to fix bad API data.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Ongoing notification can be expanded again.
Reduced unnecessary paddings and improved large font support.
You can now type lat,lon pairs directly into the address search box. Removed dedicated lat lon entry.
Fixed bug where alerts would send even when disabled.
Other small improvements.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Added minutely home screen widget.
Changed hourly to be pill shaped to fit text; especially for larger font sizes to fit.
Removed Precip Intensity from daily data point selection.
Removed "Intensity" unit. It is now inherited from Amount.
Shadow testing lat, lon based alerts.
Added Knot wind speed unit.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
This is a major release including over 20 significant improvements! They are available in the apps change log.

Here are some of the many improvements:
- Added 2 new weather sources.
- Big performance and stability improvements.
- Added minutely notifications.
- Improved themes.
- Improved home screen and hourly viewer.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
New and improved settings system that can support new features and multiple languages.
Settings have been reset
Added renaming locations.
Added support for alerts per location.
Removed forecast length restrictions for free users!
Added tapping on alerts to maps.
Minutely widget is now 60 minutes.
Replaced firebase crashlytics (automatic bug/error reporting) with self-hosted sentry to improve app privacy.

Removed forecast length restrictions for free users!
Added tapping on alerts to maps.
Minutely widget is now 60 minutes.
Replaced firebase crashlytics (automatic bug/error reporting) with self-hosted sentry to improve app privacy.

title: Shadow Weather: Hyperlocal forecast & radar

creator: Shadow Weather LLC
descriptionHtml:
Download Shadow Weather to get the most complete and accurate forecast available. Smart weather conditions and notifications will let you know of severe alerts and when the storm will start so you can be ahead of the weather.

Once the storm hits you have powerful interactive radar tools with severe storm cell tracking and a real time lightning strike tracker. Minute by minute precipitation forecasting keeps you on top of the storm.

Shadow Weather syncs with your phone's calendar so you can know the forecast for upcoming events easily.

Keep track of your health with air quality information.

You can easily see the past and current radar using the fastest most powerful and customizable interactive radar.

Here are some of the features: daily forecast, hourly forecast, minutely forecasts, weather alerts, air quality, interactive radar, storm tracker, and more!



Imagery Powered by AerisWeather, RealEarth
Data Powered by AerisWeather, Dark Sky.
descriptionShort: Smart Weather Conditions. Live lightning tracker. Severe storm tracker.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Free users now have access to limited Maps layers with a banner ad at the top of the page. Like the all other ads, they are forced to be non-personalized for privacy.
AerisWeather has rebranded to Vaisala Xweather.
Loading speed improvements.
Added Iso Bars forecast maps layer
Fixed visual bug with Apple Weather forecast's 'red' haze

descriptionShort: Smart Weather Conditions. Live lightning tracker. Severe storm tracker.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
hotfix attempt to fix black screen on some devices
New and improved NEXRAD Level II viewer built for weather enthusiasts from the ground up!
Includes the 4 main products, REF, VEL, SRV (derived), and CC for every available sweep elevation the radar scans!
Data is displayed with as low as a 10 second latency from the radar product generator!
Includes new tools for measurement, distance, and drawing.
You can now pan around the left and right sides of the world in the maps page

Shadow Weather
2.7.0

descriptionShort: Smart Weather Conditions. Live lightning tracker. Severe storm tracker.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
New Primary Navigation in the app. All of the items in the top left drawer have been moved to the bottom of the Home screen or to the navigation bar
New layout for maps screen for a more full-screen experience. Maps layers are now brighter and map labels are shown above layers.
Nexrad Page: Rendering bug fixes. Added more layers to Level II maps. Stations are now red colored when offline and the radar status message can be read
Added SPC Day 1 and 2 outlooks to the maps page

title:
Shadow Weather
3.0.0
